Desc.entry: Provides a varied and flexible musicianship training scheme in South Yorkshire for young musicians. Offers classes in choral training, advanced training, composition, sight-reading skills, improvisation, music history, composer portraits, aural classes (including post grade 8 aural classes), classes dedicated to performance, focussing primarily upon chamber music. Students are coached in ensembles and in solo performance classes. Senior Music School caters for students grade 5 and over; Junior Music School caters for grades 2-5 (see separate entry).
